wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

Interface EditorComponent.Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorComponent.EditableTC, EditorComponent.NonEditableTC, EditorComponent.RenderedController, EditorComponent.TextController
    Enclosing class:
    EditorComponent

    private static interface EditorComponent.Controller
    The JTextField is controlled via this interface.
